TermDesc:
The DMG Multipliers of Sawring - Blitz, Chainsaw Mode - Dodge Counter, and Sawring - Eradication are increased by 120%.
Ring of Chainsaw consumed by Sawring- Blitz and Chainsaw Mode - Dodge Counter additionally increases the DMG Multiplier of Sawring - Eradication by 120%.
Casting Sawring - Eradication ends Woven Myriad - Convergence.
